players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice was killed, so mafia is among us three. Let's share our thoughts carefully."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
You: "Diana, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you're truly the detective, why reveal yourself immediately and make yourself a target? This seems like a desperate mafia play to me."

Diana: "Bob, if I were mafia, why would I falsely claim detective and accuse you? That would guarantee my arrest when the real detective investigates or counters. I have nothing to gain by lying about this investigation."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why not wait to reveal? Bob has a point about making yourself a target. This feels rushed."

You: "Charlie makes an excellent point. A real detective would gather more information before revealing. Diana's immediate accusation without any corroboration is exactly what a panicked mafioso would do to deflect suspicion."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
